<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Follow-Up Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=1614) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You used your previous action to make a melee Strike that missed.

</column>

---

Even in the face of failure you press the attack, determined to succeed. Make a Strike with the same weapon, adding the effects of the [backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173) and [forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180) weapon traits.
